name: TIMCircularProgress
summary: TIMCircularProgress is a UIView subclass with circular UIProgressView properties.
description:
TIMCircularProgress is a fork of DACircularProgress. 

TIMCircularProgress is a UIView subclass with circular UIProgressView properties.
It was built to be an imitation of Facebook's photo progress indicator.

Version 1.0.0 begins from 2.3.1 of original pod.

Originally build by Daniel Amitay
